resources.string: Describe the bug in one sentence

Describe the bug in details with the reproduction steps. For example:
1. Open App
2. Connect Flipper
3. Open "Archive" tab
4. Press to "Sub-Ghz" category

Expected result: I see my Sub-Ghz keys
Actual result: The app closes

We are very ashamed that you had problems with the application. Please document the bug on the forum. There are detailed instructions on how to do it: [https://docs.flipperzero.one/mobile-app/bug-report](https://docs.flipperzero.one/mobile-app/bug-report) \n\nAfter that, we can take care of it. Also please check the bug in dev/beta version of the application. If it does not reproduce, then it is already fixed
